meanings.definition: objects, such as coins or stamps, that are issued to honor or remember a person or event
meanings.sent1: I collect commemorative coins from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The stamp collector eagerly awaited the new set of commemorative stamps.
meanings.sent3: The commemorative coins were so shiny, they almost looked like treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of commemorative stamps was a colorful mosaic of history.
meanings.sent5: The commemorative coins gleamed in the sunlight, each one telling a unique story.

meanings.definition: relating to or involving the act of commemorating or remembering something
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a special exhibit of commemorative artwork.
meanings.sent2: The commemorative plaque was placed in the park to honor the fallen soldiers.
meanings.sent3: She wore a commemorative pin to celebrate the anniversary of her favorite band.
meanings.sent4: The town held a commemorative ceremony to mark the end of the war.
meanings.sent5: The commemorative statue stood tall, a symbol of remembrance for generations to come.
